defs: = ಪತ್ರಾಂಗುಲಿ.
a kind of ink (used to write on the leaves of palm trees, etc.).
a place where public records, documents, etc. are kept; an archive.
a place where material having documentary interest, as private papers, institutional records, memorabilia or photographs, is kept; an archive.
he who has a large number of vehicles.
an expert in sword-fight.
the lobe of the ear.
(gen.) a bird that has wings.
a tree that has leaves.
any of various accipitrine birds (family: Accipitridae) having a characteristic curved beak, short, rounded wings and a long tail and legs; a hawk.
an arrow (that is tied with feathers at the rear end).
the palm tree Borassum flabellifer ( = B. flabelliformis) of Arecaceae family; palmyra palm.
a mountain.
an instrument of metal, used by the ancients for writing on waxed tablets, having one end pointed for incising the letters; a stylus.
a chariot.
a man who travels or fights sitting in a chariot.
a man whose duty is to season the leaves of palmyra trees and making ready for writing on.
= ಪತ್ರಕರ್ತ.
a collective interview granted to media personnel as by a celebrity or personage.
an assemblage of journalists called for, for purpose of giving some information to be published through various media.
the work of gathering, writing, editing, and publishing or disseminating news, as through newspapers and magazines or by radio and television.
= ಪತ್ರಿಕಾವೃತ್ತಿ.
a person engaged in the work of gathering, writing, editing, and publishing or disseminating news, as through newspapers and magazines or by radio and television.

freedom to publish newspapers, magazines, books, etc. or to telecast news and information, without government interference or prior censorship, but subject, after publication, to laws prohibiting sedition, libel, and obscenity; freedom of the press.
a statement issued by a person to journalists for purpose of its being published in the news media; a press-statement.
a paper to write on.
a written message addressed to someone; a letter.
a newspaper or a periodical.
a metal plate having some message, information on a transaction, etc. carved on.
the sharp edge of a sword or any other cutting instrument.
the outer covering of the hard, aromatic seed of the tree Myristica fragtrans of Myristiaceae family, that yields the spice mace.
the grass Eragrostis tenella ( = E. plumosa) of Poaceae family.
= ಪತ್ರಿಕಾವೃತ್ತಿ.
= ಪತ್ರಕರ್ತ.
= ಪತ್ರಿಕಾವೃತ್ತಿ.
= ಪತ್ರಕರ್ತ.
= ಪತ್ರವಾಹನ.
(myth.) Garuḍa, the king of birds.
a leaf of a plant.
a leaf or leaves of certain plants used for worshipping a deity.
the outer covering of the hard, aromatic seed of the tree Myristica fragtrans of Myristiaceae family, that yields the spice mace.
a kind of plant (Anisochilus carnosus or Artemisia indica ?).
a leaf or leaves of plants as tobacco, marijuana, etc.
a metal plate.
a kind of spicy and oil-fried cake made using the leaves of Colocasia esculenta.
the tree Calosanthes indica.
the midium-sized, deciduous tree Anogeissus latifolia ( = Conocarpus latifolia) of Combretaceae family, with hard wood, used for making agricultural implements; axle-wood tree; (?).
a silk-cloth.
the letter or the sound of 'p'.
a road, way, course.
a unit or division of an army.
a group of persons.
juggling tricks; the art of conjuring; conjuration.
to cause to undertake a journey.
weariness, fatigue caused by journey.
one who shows the path; a guide.
a man who is confused about his further path, way he has to travel, about the further course of action, etc.
(fig.) an utterly confused, baffled man.
the act, fact or condition of being confused, bewildered about one's path, way that one has to travel, about the further course of action, etc.
the condition of being utterly confused or baffled.
an engineer who constructs, plans to construct a road, path, bridge, etc.; a road-engineer.
= ಪಥಪರಿಶ್ರಮ.
fatigued, become weary from travelling.
= ಪಥಪರಿಶ್ರಮ.
one who has become weary from travelling.
a secondary unit of measurement of distance.
a kind of yogic posture.
a man who travels or is travelling.
= ಪಥಪರಿಶ್ರಮ.
to be wholesome, healthful, salutary, etc.
suitable for the way, course or travelling.
promoting or helping to recover, one's health.
providing comfort, ease or pleasantness (to the mind).
that which is suitable for the way, course or travelling.
a thing, food (as prescribed by a physician, dietician) etc. that promotes or helps to recover, one's health.
the system of having one's food, as prescribed by a physician, nutrion etc. or that which promotes or helps recovering one's health.
that which provides comfort, ease or pleasantness (to the mind) (as advice, solace, etc.).
the tree Terminalia chebula of Combretaceae family.
its nut; ink nut; black myrobalan.
a variety inārya metre.
a proper or good state or condition.
a condition; state of being.
an opportune time; a right moment.
the manner, way, method in which something is done, happens or is to be done, must happen, etc.
the condition of (food) being in right or fit condition.
the right degree of ripeness (of a fruit).
sharpness, keenness (as of a weapon, instrument, etc.).
a liquid used in sharpening, whetting a weapon or instrument.
dampness; moisture.
the watery discharge from the vagina when a woman reaches the peak of her sexual excitement in copulation.
kindness, favour or grace.
that which is appropriate, apt, suitable, fit, etc.
skill; dexterity; talent; ability.
the state of being tempered; the state of a metal with regard to the degree of hardness and resilience.
information; news; report of recent happenings, etc.
a cause or motive; a reason.
that by which something is done or obtained; agency; a means.
the terminal part of the leg in vertebrates, below the ankle joint, on which the body stands and moves; a foot.
the distance covered by a single step while walking; pace.
an impression of the sole of a person's foot; a foot-print.
a way; a path; a road.
something that indicates a fact; a sign.
a position of authority, esp. in a government business, institution, etc.
space; room.
the state of being relieved from the worldliness, cycle of birth and death, etc.; salvation; emancipation.
suitable scope or opportunity.
a place of dwelling; a house.
a thing that can be seen or touched; an object.
anything producing an effect or result.
a false reason or motive put forth to hide the real one; a pretext.
matters of business or concern; affairs.
a protecting or being protected.
a method of reciting vedic hymns, arranging each word of vedic text separately in its original form without regard to the rules of sandhi (euphonic junctions as per grammar).
a ray of light.
a unit for measuring the area of land.
(gram.) the inflected form of a word.
(mus.) a sort of compositions that gives more emphasis for rhythm and mostly used in dancing.
a rhythmical composition, sometimes rhymed, expressing experiences, ideas or emotions in a style more concentrated; a poem.
a single row of words or characters making up a unit of poetry, often of a specified number of feet; a line.
(arith.) a symbol for the number two.

to heat (a metal) to make (it) have right temperment.
to cook, bake properly.
that which is annealed and has right temperment.
to utter; to speak.

to move away from the right path; to swerve.

the required trend,maturity, mood, etc.

to make (something) ready; to prepare.
to make something suitable for some purpose or bring to the required temperment.
to make feel less sad or less disappointed; to comfort; to console; to solace.

to bring (someone or something) under one's control.
to become suitable for some purpose or be brought to the required temperment.
to be joyful; to be happy, glad.
to be appropriate to a particular time; to be timely.
to be under another's control; to be controlled.
to get an opportunity; to have an opportune moment.
a small, flat, round or square ornamental piece of metal (as of gold) hung by a string (as in a necklace) worn round the neck.
a small flat piece of metal, bearing an inscription or design, issued to commemorate a person, action or event or given as a reward for bravery, merit or the like; a medal.
a man versed well in reciting of vedic hymns in ಪದಪಾಠ method (see: ಪದ2 - 16).
a kind of ornament.
a kind of plant.
a more or less detailed alphabetical listing, in a book, of names, places, and topics along with the numbers of the pages on which they are mentioned or discussed; an index.
(pros.) a metrical stanza.
an ornamental circlet worn around the ankle; an anklet.
an argument that contains too many words; a verbose or tautological statement.

a book containing a selection of the words of a language, usu. arranged alphabetically, giving information about their meanings, expressed in either the same or another language; a glossary; a dictionary.
a particular mode of elaborating the grouping of rhythmic beats into measures of equal or unequal length.

a walking.
a man who goes or travels on foot; a walker.
a foot-soldier.
a walking.
the manner of walking.

a fruit that is about to become ripened.
a man who sings lyrical poems or padas (a kind of musical composition).

the act or an instance of coming to or attaining a position of power; an assumption of an office.
a trampling heavily.
its impact.
